vote.title: Authorize a professional engineering services contract for traffic signal design services for the following six intersections selected as part of the 2021 Highway Safety Improvement Program: Great Trinity Forest Way at Wadsworth Drive; Davis Street at Westmoreland Road; Illinois Avenue at Knoxville Street; Illinois Avenue at Westmoreland Road; Beckley Avenue at Saner Avenue; Westmoreland Road at Wheatland Road; and other related tasks - Lee Engineering, LLC, most highly qualified proposer of five - Not to exceed $305,801.95 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
vote.description: Authorize a professional engineering services contract for traffic signal design services for the following six intersections selected as part of the 2021 Highway Safety Improvement Program: Great Trinity Forest Way at Wadsworth Drive; Davis Street at Westmoreland Road; Illinois Avenue at Knoxville Street; Illinois Avenue at Westmoreland Road; Beckley Avenue at Saner Avenue; Westmoreland Road at Wheatland Road; and other related tasks - Lee Engineering, LLC, most highly qualified proposer of five - Not to exceed $305,801.95 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
